attributes.action: Stop the benefits for people illegally coming into england
attributes.additional_details: It’s about time we looked after our own before anyone else
attributes.background: Stop the benefits for immigrants illegally coming in and give them to our ex service men on the streets

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop illegal migrants from accessing financial support
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731719
